name: Jeopard
overview: Similar to the Risk board game, in Jeopard the world is divided into 42 territories and 6 continents. The goal being to fight up to 7 of your friends in order to control all of them. You do this by attacking neighboring countries, some times many times so there is a Repeat Last Attack button to speed things us. Winning or losing is based on die rolls. Like the previously mentioned board game, you can earn cards by controlling key sections of the board and these cards, randomly chosen from the deck can give you bonus armies to distribute along with the number given for region control.
